verses.verse: Therefore, thou son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, prophesy <WH5012> <WH8734> against Gog <WH1463>, and say <WH559> <WH8804>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Behold, I am against thee, O Gog <WH1463>, the chief <WH7218> prince <WH5387> of Meshech <WH4902> and Tubal <WH8422>:

And I will turn thee back <WH7725> <WH8790>, and leave but the sixth part <WH8338> <WH8765> of thee, and will cause thee to come up <WH5927> <WH8689> from the north <WH6828> parts <WH3411>, and will bring <WH935> <WH8689> thee upon the mountains <WH2022> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>:
And I will smite <WH5221> <WH8689> thy bow <WH7198> out of thy left <WH8040> hand <WH3027>, and will cause thine arrows <WH2671> to fall <WH5307> <WH8686> out of thy right <WH3225> hand <WH3027>.

Thou shalt fall <WH5307> <WH8799> upon the mountains <WH2022> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, thou, and all thy bands <WH102>, and the people <WH5971> that is with thee: I will give <WH5414> <WH8804> thee unto the ravenous <WH5861> birds <WH6833> of every sort <WH3671>, and to the beasts <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> to be devoured <WH402>.
Thou shalt fall <WH5307> <WH8799> upon the open <WH6440> field <WH7704>: for I have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> it, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

And I will send <WH7971> <WH8765> a fire <WH784> on Magog <WH4031>, and among them that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> carelessly <WH983> in the isles <WH339>: and they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.

So will I make my holy <WH6944> name <WH8034> known <WH3045> <WH8686> in the midst <WH8432> of my people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478>; and I will not let them pollute <WH2490> <WH8686> my holy <WH6944> name <WH8034> any more: and the heathen <WH1471> shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>, HaKadosh <WH6918> in Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
Behold, it is come <WH935> <WH8804>, and it is done <WH1961> <WH8738>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; this is the day <WH3117> whereof I have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765>.

And they that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> in the cities <WH5892> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> shall go forth <WH3318> <WH8804>, and shall set <WH1197> <WH8765> on fire <WH784> and burn <WH5400> <WH8689> the weapons <WH5402>, both the shields <WH4043> and the bucklers <WH6793>, the bows <WH7198> and the arrows <WH2671>, and the handstaves <WH3027> <WH4731>, and the spears <WH7420>, and they shall burn <WH1197> <WH8765> them with fire <WH784> seven <WH7651> years <WH8141>:

So that they shall take <WH5375> <WH8799> no wood <WH6086> out of the field <WH7704>, neither cut down <WH2404> <WH8799> any out of the forests <WH3293>; for they shall burn <WH1197> <WH8762> the weapons <WH5402> with fire <WH784>: and they shall spoil <WH7997> <WH8804> those that spoiled <WH7997> <WH8802> them, and rob <WH962> <WH8804> those that robbed <WH962> <WH8802> them, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <WH3117>, that I will give <WH5414> <WH8799> unto Gog <WH1463> a place <WH4725> there of graves <WH6913> in Yisra'EL <WH3478>, the valley <WH1516> of the passengers <WH5674> <WH8802> on the east <WH6926> of the sea <WH3220>: and it shall stop <WH2629> <WH8802> the noses of the passengers <WH5674> <WH8802>: and there shall they bury <WH6912> <WH8804> Gog <WH1463> and all his multitude <WH1995>: and they shall call <WH7121> <WH8804> it The valley <WH1516> of Hamongog <WH1996>.
And seven <WH7651> months <WH2320> shall the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> be burying <WH6912> <WH8804> of them, that they may cleanse <WH2891> <WH8763> the land <WH776>.

Yea, all the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> shall bury <WH6912> <WH8804> them; and it shall be to them a renown <WH8034> the day <WH3117> that I shall be glorified <WH3513> <WH8736>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

And they shall sever out <WH914> <WH8686> men <WH582> of continual employment <WH8548>, passing through <WH5674> <WH8802> the land <WH776> to bury <WH6912> <WH8764> with the passengers <WH5674> <WH8802> those that remain <WH3498> <WH8737> upon the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH776>, to cleanse <WH2891> <WH8763> it: after the end <WH7097> of seven <WH7651> months <WH2320> shall they search <WH2713> <WH8799>.

And the passengers <WH5674> <WH8802> that pass through <WH5674> <WH8804> the land <WH776>, when any seeth <WH7200> <WH8804> a man's <WH120> bone <WH6106>, then shall he set up <WH1129> <WH8804> a sign <WH6725> by <WH681> it, till the buriers <WH6912> <WH8764> have buried <WH6912> <WH8804> it in the valley <WH1516> of Hamongog <WH1996>.
And also the name <WH8034> of the city <WH5892> shall be Hamonah <WH1997>. Thus shall they cleanse <WH2891> <WH8765> the land <WH776>.

And, thou son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Speak <WH559> <WH8798> unto every feathered <WH3671> fowl <WH6833>, and to every beast <WH2416> of the field <WH7704>, Assemble <WH6908> <WH8734> yourselves, and come <WH935> <WH8798>; gather <WH622> <WH8734> yourselves on every side <WH5439> to my sacrifice <WH2077> that I do sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8802> for you, even a great <WH1419> sacrifice <WH2077> upon the mountains <WH2022> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, that ye may eat <WH398> <WH8804> flesh <WH1320>, and drink <WH8354> <WH8804> blood <WH1818>.

Ye shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> the flesh <WH1320> of the mighty <WH1368>, and drink <WH8354> <WH8799> the blood <WH1818> of the princes <WH5387> of the earth <WH776>, of rams <WH352>, of lambs <WH3733>, and of goats <WH6260>, of bullocks <WH6499>, all of them fatlings <WH4806> of Bashan <WH1316>.

And ye shall eat <WH398> <WH8804> fat <WH2459> till ye be full <WH7654>, and drink <WH8354> <WH8804> blood <WH1818> till ye be drunken <WH7943>, of my sacrifice <WH2077> which I have sacrificed <WH2076> <WH8804> for you.

Thus ye shall be filled <WH7646> <WH8804> at my table <WH7979> with horses <WH5483> and chariots <WH7393>, with mighty men <WH1368>, and with all men <WH376> of war <WH4421>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

And I will set <WH5414> <WH8804> my glory <WH3519> among the heathen <WH1471>, and all the heathen <WH1471> shall see <WH7200> <WH8804> my judgment <WH4941> that I have executed <WH6213> <WH8804>, and my hand <WH3027> that I have laid <WH7760> <WH8804> upon them.
So the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068> their 'Elohim <WH430> from that day <WH3117> and forward <WH1973>.

And the heathen <WH1471> shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> went into captivity <WH1540> <WH8804> for their iniquity <WH5771>: because they trespassed <WH4603> <WH8804> against me, therefore hid <WH5641> <WH8686> I my face <WH6440> from them, and gave <WH5414> <WH8799> them into the hand <WH3027> of their enemies <WH6862>: so fell <WH5307> <WH8799> they all by the sword <WH2719>.
According to their uncleanness <WH2932> and according to their transgressions <WH6588> have I done <WH6213> <WH8804> unto them, and hid <WH5641> <WH8686> my face <WH6440> from them.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Now will I bring again <WH7725> <WH8686> the captivity <WH7622> <WH8675> <WH7622> of Ya`akov <WH3290>, and have mercy <WH7355> <WH8765> upon the whole house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and will be jealous <WH7065> <WH8765> for my holy <WH6944> name <WH8034>;

After that they have borne <WH5375> <WH8804> their shame <WH3639>, and all their trespasses <WH4604> whereby they have trespassed <WH4603> <WH8804> against me, when they dwelt <WH3427> <WH8800> safely <WH983> in their land <WH127>, and none made them afraid <WH2729> <WH8688>.

When I have brought them again <WH7725> <WH8788> from the people <WH5971>, and gathered <WH6908> <WH8765> them out of their enemies <WH341> <WH8802> ' lands <WH776>, and am sanctified <WH6942> <WH8738> in them in the sight <WH5869> of many <WH7227> nations <WH1471>;

Then shall they know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068> their 'Elohim <WH430>, which caused them to be led into captivity <WH1540> <WH8687> among the heathen <WH1471>: but I have gathered <WH3664> <WH8765> them unto their own land <WH127>, and have left <WH3498> <WH8686> none of them any more there.

Neither will I hide <WH5641> <WH8686> my face <WH6440> any more from them: for I have poured out <WH8210> <WH8804> my spirit <WH7307> upon the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
